*PR Title should start with one of the following tags: [Fix]/[Feature]/[Style]/[Update]*

*[Fix]- Bug Fix*

*[Feature]- for new feature*

*[Style]- Grammar or branding fix*

*[Update]-For an update to an existing feature*
